Assessment.QuestionText: You want to display the Index tab of the help file, Employees.chm using the ShowHelp() method of Help class when the user clicks a button. Which one of the following codes will help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
Button btnHelp = new Button();
Controls.Add(btnHelp);
private void btnHelp_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
  Help.ShowHelp(this, @"c:\Employees.chm", HelpNavigator.Index);
}

Button btnHelp = new Button();
Controls.Add(btnHelp);
private void btnHelp_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
  Help.ShowHelp(this, @"c:\Employees.chm");
}

Button btnHelp = new Button();
Controls.Add(btnHelp);
private void btnHelp_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
  Help.ShowHelp(this, @"c:\Employees.chm", HelpNavigators.IndexTab);
}

Button btnHelp = new Button();
Controls.Add(btnHelp);
private void btnHelp_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
  Help.ShowHelp(@"c:\Employees.chm");
}

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selection is: (A).
